title: SFEC Form 3209b - Notification of Recusal Filings
description: Any  member  of  a  City  board  or  commission  other  than  a  member  of  the  Board  of  Supervisors  (See Campaign  and  Governmental  Conduct  Code  Section  3.209(c))  who  is  required  to  file  a  statement  of  economic interests pursuant to Article III, Chapter 1 of the Campaign and Governmental Conduct Code must file form 3209b each time the member recuses him or herself from a matter being considered by the board or commission.  Form 3209b is due within 15 calendar days after the date of the meeting at which the recusal occurred and must be accompanied by a copy of the meeting agenda containing the item that triggered the recusal.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing URL
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original or Amendment? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Member Name
columns.description: Name of member of the board or commission

columns.name: Recusal Date
columns.description: Date of Recusal (the date of the meeting at which the recusal occurred or would have occurred)

columns.name: Agenda Item Number
columns.description: Agenda item number at the meeting on the recusal date

columns.name: Matter Concerns Making of a Contract
columns.description: Check box indicating if the matter concerns the making of a contract

columns.name: Financial Interest
columns.description: Explanation of the financial interest causing the recusal

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form signed and filed by filer
